Clinical Trials

Social media influence & conventional ad analysis

Description

Ever wondered about measuring your employees added value to the company, but have not yet decided how to perform the analysis based on the ML solutions? We are here to help.

Identify learning opportunities for your employees and areas of improvement. Share knowledge and training practices that are best absorbed across your company.

Our experienced team had utilized advanced scoring methods used in video games, association football, American football, basketball, Major League Baseball, table tennis, Scrabble, board games, etc. to deliver the relative skill levels of employees. We have experience in Nursing, Pharmaceutical, HR, Engineering, employee KPI.
